name: Requirement System Analyst
description:
For our client (the company developing IIOT products and which is one of the world leading company in the field of energy transformation) we are currently looking for

REQUIREMENT System Analyst (remote)

REQUIREMENTS:

  • Experience of interaction with the developers of web\mobile applications

  • Ability to interact with product management team and evaluate the needs of users;

  • Ability to transform business requirements into structured models and use cases;

  • Quick learner with an analytical, innovative and process oriented mindset;

  • Experience in working on Web/Mobile Products

  • Knowledge of Cloud environment;

  • English: Upper-Intermediate or above;

  • Experience with ERP or CRM systems (advisable);

  • Higher technical education.

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Participation in projects - development of cloud based software;

  • Preparing Requirements, Feature Specifications, AutoTests Specifications and Test Cases;

  • Function and Usability Testing, Acceptance Testing, Defect Analysis, Bugs Verification;

  • Verification of the implemented functionality for compliance with the requirements;

  • Interviewing product managers (native speakers) in English;

  • Documenting scenarios of using the product.

What we offer:

- Full-time job

- Flexible working hours

- International team

We will waiting for your CV!
